homepage_subtitle: Your #1 Guide to Improve your Skills.
game_valorant_description_long: Tactical shooter meets high-speed ability warfare - where precision and strategy collide.
about_tagline: Your new favorite hub for improving your gameplay across a variety of strategy and team-based games.
about_intro: We created this platform with one goal: Bring together scattered gaming knowledge into one clear, helpful, and easy-to-use site. Whether you're looking for tips, lineups, mechanics, or game-specific guides - we've got you covered.
about_mission_point1: Clear and up-to-date guides to improve your skills
about_mission_point3: A place to share and explore community-created game templates
about_mission_point4: A focus on strategy and team-play games, not cheats or hacks
about_difference_point1: Community-Driven Ideas: Suggest and rate game templates
about_difference_point2: Customizable Layouts: Dark mode, favorites, and personal flair
about_difference_point3: Optional Premium Access: For deep-dive guides and exclusive content
about_difference_point4: Multilingual Support: Available in German, English, and French
about_who_description: We're two students, turning our passion for gaming and development into a real product. Backed by a clear project plan, real stakeholder analysis, and risk management, this isn't just a school project - it's a growing platform for gamers, by gamers.
about_involved_description: Share your own tips, rate existing guides, or just enjoy the content.
about_involved_callToAction: Together, we grow better at the games we love.
auth_register_prompt: Don't have an account yet? Register here
auth_login_prompt: Already have an account? Sign in here
